revised_title: Exploring the Structure and Formation of Cellulose in Cotton Hairs
tldr: The authors studied the structure and formation of cellulose in cotton hairs, using microscopy techniques and chemical treatments. They discovered the presence of two types of spirals in the cell walls, which play a role in the plant's growth and development. The findings provide insights into the molecular structure of cellulose and its role in plant cell walls.
